mapper.select: select store_no, business_registration_no, business_registration, store_name, address, tel, hour, introduction, evaluation_score, reservation_accept, max_member, lat, lng, place_id, oper, status from store order by store_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into store( business_registration_no, business_registration, store_name, address, tel, hour, introduction, evaluation_score, reservation_accept, max_member, lat, lng, place_id, oper, status ) values( #{businessRegistrationNo}, #{businessRegistration}, #{storeName}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{hour}, #{introduction}, #{evaluationScore}, #{reservationAccept}, #{maxMember}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{placeId}, #{oper}, #{status} )
mapper.select: select business_registration_no, business_registration, store_name, address, tel, hour, introduction, evaluation_score, reservation_accept, max_member, lat, lng, place_id, oper, status from store where store_no=#{no}
mapper.update: update store set business_registration_no=#{businessRegistrationNo}, business_registration=#{businessRegistration}, store_name=#{storeName}, address=#{address}, tel=#{tel}, hour=#{hour}, introduction=#{introduction}, evaluation_score=#{evaluationScore}, reservation_accept=#{reservationAccept}, max_member=#{maxMember}, lat=#{lat}, lng=#{lng}, place_id=#{placeId}, oper=#{oper}, status=#{status} where store_no=#{storeNo}
